content.title: Configuring Services for Edit Recipients
content.body:
1. From the right pane of the Action Editor, click Construct Filter Query.
    The Mapping Editor appears.
  2. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Navigation Object, and select lblRecipientIDValue_text {string}.
  3. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > Service - RecipientStorage$Recipients$get, and select RecipientID {number}.
    Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types.
  4. Click OK.
